title: Emmy Rossum is elegant in pink pant suit and shiny heels at NY premiere for Apple's The Morning Show
text:
She quit the hit Showtime series Shameless after nine seasons last year.

And on Monday night in New York, Emmy Rossum made a rare solo red carpet appearance at the premiere for Apple TV's The Morning Show.

Rossum, 33, opted for an elegant pale pink trouser suit for the occasion and styled her dark hair back from her face in a sophisticated chignon.

Flare for fashion: Former Shameless star Emmy Rossum made a rare solo red carpet appearance Monday night at the premiere for Apple's The Morning Show in New York

The actress's outfit featured a double breasted jacket that she wore buttoned up and baggy pants tied with excess fabric at the ankle.

She paired the tailored suit with shiny heels and a diamond necklace.

Her makeup included pink eye shadow and dark pink lip color for a coordinated look.

Looking good: Rossum, 33, opted for an elegant pale pink trouser suit for the occasion. The outfit featured a double breasted jacket and baggy pants tied with excess fabric at the ankle

Poised: She paired the tailored suit with shiny heels and a diamond necklace and styled her dark hair back from her face in a sophisticated chignon

Rossum, who is married to Mr. Robot creator Sam Esmail, recently directed an episode of Amazon's new original series Modern Love.

It comes after she helmed two episodes of Shameless, one in 2016 and the other in 2017, as well as an episode of TNT's Animal Kingdom in 2017.

According to her IMDb page, she is attached to play LA icon Angelyne who starred in a series of famous billboards in Los Angeles in the 1980s in a mini series about her life based on an article published in The Hollywood reporter.
